## Sequential Feature Selection

```{r}
library(daltoolbox)
library(daltoolboxdp)
```

### Example

```{r}
iris <- datasets::iris

# Initialize Sequential Feature Selector (new name)
fs_mod <- create_fe_sequential_fs_model(
  n_neighbors = 3,
  direction = "forward",
  n_features_to_select = 2
)

# Apply feature selection (new name)
X_selected <- fit_transform_fe_sequential_fs(fs_mod, iris, "Species")

# Show dimensions
cat("Original shape:", dim(iris), "\n")
cat("Shape after selection:", dim(X_selected), "\n")
head(X_selected)
```
